cause.description:
We all need to donate a few bucks now and then to help needy kids around the US. I know you guys are going to clubs and spending $20 to get in, maybe spending $30-$40 on drinks. So what’s $1 or $2 dollars a week going to do to you? You’re buying Diesel Jeans Seven Jeans and Affliction Shirts all over $100, so please just take your credit card out of you wallet and donate $1 a week. That’s only $4 a month. Believe me when I say this.... It really will make you feel a lot better about yourself. So donate a couple bucks now and then, so some young little kid that’s not even getting $5 a week allowance can eat or buy a t-shirt, socks or shoes. Please send this to all your friends on facebook so we can raise some money for the little kids. Thank you Ashkan
1. The kid wants to each
2. Stop child abuse
3. Start donating
cause.name: Little Kids
